DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose project conduct innovative , culturally-tailored demonstration project design facilitate adoption maintenance regular , moderate physical activity ( i.e. , brisk walking ) sample sedentary African American woman . In addition , test impact vary type counsel social support adoption maintenance regular physical activity help woman improve weight control . The core behavioral change program base comprehensive wellness orient website offer National Black Women 's Health Project ( NBWHP ) . Comparisons make effect web-based program minimal face face contact , primarily enrollment , data collection , participant retention , web-based program addition telephone counsel support , web-based program face face group counsel support . Hypotheses . Hypothesis 1 . Participation intervention result increase physical activity level , regardless level social support . Hypothesis 2 . The intervention arm involve low level social support marginally effective increase physical activity level , additional social support result significantly improve physical activity level compare low level social support . DOC.criteria: African American Women 18 year age old Have work telephone Have reliable internet service Men Physical limitation and/or disability would preclude walk program Report currently meet minimum physical activity guideline , relate health and/or weight loss
